defaultValue: The options below will be applied the next time the watchface reloads.

items.label: Render seconds
items.description: Should only be enabled if you don't care about battery life.

items.label: Use taps to show seconds
items.description: Only update seconds after a tap and until the next minute. If used without render seconds, the time will be replaced.

items.label: Cached rendering
items.description: Enables experimental caching of the battle-screen. This increases memory usage but may also reduce battery drain.

items.label: Vibrate on achievement
items.description: This option respects quiet time but may still wake you up.
